content: teddy bear tee shirt by monicarose51designs fits bears 15-17 inches tall chest 12 - 18 inches materials needed size g crochet hook worsted weight yarn abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet st stitch rnds rounds single_crochet single_crochet work starts in the middle of the back at the neckline worked in the round after row 1 chain 61 row 1 work single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 60 single_crochet round 2 chain 2 does not count as first double_crochet in each round work double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in next 11 single_crochet * 2dc in next single_crochet double_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet ** double_crochet in next 24 single_crochet repeat from * to ** once double_crochet in last 12 single_crochet slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 64 double_crochet round 3 chain 2 double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet * 2dc in next double_crochet double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet ** double_crochet in next 24 double_crochet repeat from * to ** once double_crochet in last 12 double_crochet slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 68 double_crochet round 4 chain 2 double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet * 2dc in next double_crochet double_crochet in next 8 double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet ** double_crochet in next 24 double_crochet repeat from * to ** once double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 72 double_crochet round 5 chain 2 double_crochet in same double_crochet as joining double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet * 2dc in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet five times 2dc in next 2 double_crochet ** double_crochet in next 24 double_crochet repeat from * to ** once double_crochet in last 12 double_crochet slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 86 double_crochet round 6 sleeves chain 2 double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet chain 4 skip next 19 double_crochet double_crochet in next 24 double_crochet chain 4 skip next 19 double_crochet double_crochet in last 12 double_crochet slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 48 double_crochet 8 chain round 7 ch2 double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain around slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 56 double_crochet rounds 8 - 10 or to desired length chain 2 double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in each double_crochet around slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet end off weave in ends you can work rnds 1 2 and your last round in contrast color if desired or have some fun creating stripes
